Class MassBlob

java.lang.Object
  




public class MassBlob
extends ScrollActor

The class responsible for the mass ejected from the cell. Other cells can pick up mass blobs to gain additional mass.

Author:
Wayde Gilliam, Brian Turner, Cecilia Martin, Ethan Harris
